courses.title: React Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of React, including components, state, and props.

courses.title: Advanced React
courses.description: Dive deeper into React with advanced concepts like hooks, context, and performance optimization.

courses.title: Node.js Basics
courses.description: Introduction to Node.js, including modules, asynchronous programming, and building simple servers.

courses.title: Building RESTful APIs with Node.js
courses.description: Learn how to design and build RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.

courses.title: Full Stack Development with React and Node.js
courses.description: A comprehensive course on building full-stack applications with React and Node.js.

courses.title: React Native Essentials
courses.description: Get started with React Native and learn to build mobile applications for iOS and Android.

courses.title: Server-Side Development with Node.js
courses.description: Learn server-side programming and build scalable applications with Node.js.

courses.title: Modern JavaScript with ES6+
courses.description: Master modern JavaScript features and syntax improvements introduced in ES6 and beyond.

courses.title: GraphQL with React
courses.description: Learn to integrate GraphQL with React for efficient data fetching and management.

courses.title: Testing React Applications
courses.description: Discover best practices and tools for testing React applications to ensure quality and reliability.

courses.title: Node.js for Beginners
courses.description: A beginner's course on Node.js, including setup, basic concepts, and first projects.

courses.title: Building Real-Time Applications with Node.js
courses.description: Learn to build real-time applications with WebSockets and Node.js.

courses.title: React and Redux
courses.description: Understand state management with Redux in React applications.

courses.title: Microservices with Node.js
courses.description: Learn to build and deploy microservices using Node.js.

courses.title: Integrating APIs with React
courses.description: Learn how to integrate third-party APIs into your React applications.
